description: Number of edges in 8-partite Turán graph of order n.
references: Graham et al., Handbook of Combinatorics, Vol. 2, p. 1234.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Turán Graph [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 30 2009]
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,-1,0,0,0,0,0,1,-2,1).
formula: a(n) = round( (7/16)*n(n-2) ) +0 or -1 depending on n: if there is k such 8k+4<=n<=8k+6 then a(n) = floor( (7/16)*n*(n-2)) otherwise a(n) = round( (7/16)*n(n-2)). E.g. because 8*2+4<=21<=8*2+6 a(n) = floor((7/16)*21*19) = floor(174, 5625)=174. - _Benoit Cloitre_, Jan 17 2002a(n) = sum(0<=k<=n, A168181(k)*(n-k) ). [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 30 2009]G.f. -x^2*(x^6+x^5+x^4+x^3+x^2+x+1)/((x-1)^3*(x+1)*(x^2+1)*(x^4+1)). [_Colin Barker_, Aug 09 2012]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
